headline: CTI CRYOGENICS VACUUM PUMP
keywords: cryogenci vacuum pumps  cryo pumps  cryos  helium pumps
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Cryopumps
specstable:
Manufacturer CTI Cryogenics
Model ON-BOARD 8 Low hours
Inlet Flange ISO-K 200.0 mm (7.874 in)
Foreline Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Pumping Speed Water Vapor 4,000.00 l/s (8,476.37 CFM)
Pumping Speed Argon 1,200.00 l/s (2,542.91 CFM)
Pumping Speed Air 1,500.00 l/s (3,178.64 CFM)
Pumping Speed Hydrogen 2,500.00 l/s (5,297.73 CFM)
Accessories
Has Fast Regen option.
471 hours only.
On-Board module refurbished.
A CTI ONBOARD remote keypad is available. See Item 49424.
Compressor and helium lines not included.
Other Information P/N 8116139G001

There is a dent on the outer edge of the flange which does not affect vacuum seal, click "other images", picture #3
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 13.000 in (33.0 cm)
Depth 22.500 in (57.2 cm)
Weight 60 lb (27 kg)
